SEARCH
Package HMS.src.user

Class User

java.lang.Object
HMS.src.user.User
Direct Known Subclasses:
Administrator, Doctor, Patient, Pharmacist
public class User extends Object
Represents a user in the Hospital Management System (HMS). Each user has a unique ID, a name, a role, and personal details such as age, gender, and email. The class also provides methods to manage user attributes like passwords and email addresses.

  • Constructor Details

    • User

      public User(String userID, String name, Role role, String emailId, int age, Gender gender)
      Constructs a new User instance.
      Parameters:
      userID - The unique identifier for the user.
      name - The name of the user.
      role - The role of the user (e.g., Patient, Doctor).
      emailId - The email address of the user. If the email address is invalid, it defaults to "hms@hms.com".
      age - The age of the user.
      gender - The gender of the user.
